channel.title: Eh server error messege?
channel.description:
Ok well this is what happened. I was in item.cfg editing a ring to become a perfect ring I made the command in my commands section. It compiled fine no errors but when I tried to run my Server I got [code]Exception In thread "main" java.ArrayIndexOutofBoundsException: 17 at Itemhandler.loadItemList <ItemHandler.java:283> at Itemhandler.<init><Itemhandler.java:173 at server.main<server.java:165>[/code]
I deleted the command and the bonuses for the ring and I still get this.. does any one know what went wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2009, 12:36:15 pm[/size][hr]fixed. had to download source again and reput item.cfg

item.title: Eh server error messege?
item.dc:creator: @Pray_for_plagues Pray for plagues
item.description:
@Pray_for_plagues wrote:

You probably used spaces instead of tabs. Use tabs next time and that won’t happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Eh server error messege?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Always use tabs in configuration files.

Read full topic
